casebody.data:
Kincaid et al., Appellants, v. Howard, Appellee.

[Cite as Kincaid v. Howard (1986), 28 Ohio St. 3d 311.]

No. 86-1476 Decided December 22, 1986. Lindhorst & Dreidame, Leo J. Breslin and Mark A. MacDonald, for appellants. Kohnen & Kohnen, James A. Hunt and Ann Ruley Combs, for appellee.

*312The judgment of the court of appeals in case No. C-850545, pursuant to appellants' Proposition of Law No. 1, is hereby reversed on authority of Mominee v. Scherbarth (1986), 28 Ohio St. 3d 270, and the cause is remanded to the trial court.

Celebrezze, C.J., Sweeney, Locher, C. Brown and Douglas, JJ., concur. Holmes and Wright, JJ., dissent.
